scripts.build: bun run build:packages && bun run build:apps
scripts.docker:build:app: docker build -f apps/app/Dockerfile --build-arg TARGET_APP_PACKAGE_NAME=@usersdotfun/app --build-arg TARGET_APP_ROOT_PATH=apps/app -t usersdotfun-app .
scripts.docker:build:gateway: docker build -f apps/gateway/Dockerfile --build-arg TARGET_APP_PACKAGE_NAME=gateway --build-arg TARGET_APP_ROOT_PATH=apps/gateway -t usersdotfun-gateway .
scripts.docker:build:job-scheduler: docker build -f apps/job-scheduler/Dockerfile --build-arg TARGET_APP_PACKAGE_NAME=job-scheduler --build-arg TARGET_APP_ROOT_PATH=apps/job-scheduler -t usersdotfun-job-scheduler .
